text:
Files with images (possibly and/or charts - TBC) that have been modified by POI
will not open with Excel 2003 after Office Service Pack 3 has been installed. 
Excel running on XP SP2.  Problem applicable for POI running on Linux and POI
running on Win XP.
creator: project-dev@daltonfirth.co.uk
yegor@dinom.ru
text:
Can you attach a test case so we can try to reproduce the problem? 
I mean a sample xls file, the code to modify it and the resulting file that
fails in Office SP 3. 

Yegor

Apologies everyone.  Just realised when creating sample test cases I was using
alpha release of 3.0.  This bug exists in the alpha but appears fixed in 3.0.1
FINAL.
creator: project-dev@daltonfirth.co.uk

text:
What's the patch for this fix?

We have a custom version for our system. Integrating just 3.0.1 FINAL would not be a good choice for us.
creator: lingjiao.chen@tcg.com
